## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWritingToolsCoordinator/Context] object initializes the value of this property at creation time. Use this value to identify the context object within your app.

# identifier

**Instance Property**

The unique identifier of the context object.

## Declaration

```swift
var identifier: UUID { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWritingToolsCoordinator/Context] object initializes the value of this property at creation time. Use this value to identify the context object within your app.
title: identifier
